item.description:
Join us for a night of free comedy at Nick's Comedy Stop located near the Theatre District. Nick's has a variety of different comedians perform- it is always a low-key, fun evening. The show starts at 8pm, we will be meeting at 7:30 outside the main entrance of Nick's. Reservations are under my name, Catherine. Tickets are usually $20, but ours are free!

In order to accommodate everyone who wants to attend, "Maybe" RSVP's will be switched to a NO the day before the event.

Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) outside entrance. If need to, call 774 232 0000
item.name: Free Comedy Show Tix Nick's Comedy Stop
